import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List team product IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/teams/products/all/ids"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the raw list of product IDs associated with teams. This is a compact form of the product listing used for syncing or authorization checks.

**Prerequisites**
- None.

**Workflow Example**
1. Call [POST /api/v1.0/teams/products/all/ids](/docs/api/teams/list-team-product-ids).
2. Use the returned IDs to filter product-scoped operations.

**Minimal Required Fields**: none.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
